name: Koala G-Man
text: 2 Level 4 "Koala" monsters/nIf this card is Fusion Summoned: You can banish 1 "Koala" monster from your GY; add 1 "Koala card from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Koala G-Man" once per turn. If this card attacks an opponent's monster, at the start of the Damage Step: Destroy that monster. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.
